root.name: Impire
root.description: Impire is a dungeon keeper style game developed by Cyanide Montreal, released February 14th, 2013. You play as Báal-Abaddon and your goal is to recreate your dungeon to its former glory and defeat pesky adventurers who come to defeat your dungeon.System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor E8400 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+,Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® HD3000 video card with 512MB of dedicated memoryDirectX®: 9.0Hard Drive: 3 GB HD spaceSound: DirectX Compatible SoundcardOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connectionAdditional: 3-button mouse, keyboard, speakers, Internet connection for multiplayer
